SELECT P.ITEM_NO, P.ITEM_NAME, P.PRICE, IMG.FILEPATH,
M.USERID, M.USERNAME AS ORDERER_NAME, M.PHONE AS ORDERER_PHONE, M.ADDRESS, M.POINT,
C.COUPON_NAME, C.DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,
PA.P_NO, PA.P_PRICE, PA.P_WAY,
D.DELIVERY_FEE
FROM PAY PA INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON PA.ITEM_NO = P.ITEM_NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT_IMG IMG ON P.ITEM_NO = IMG.ITEM_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON PA.P_UID = M.USERID LEFT JOIN COUPON C ON C.USERID = M.USERID AND C.IS_USED = 'N' LEFT JOIN DELIVERY D ON P.ITEM_NO = D.ITEM_NO WHERE P.ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}
